privacyPolicy.title: 1. Introduction
privacyPolicy.content: This Privacy Policy explains how FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited ("FirgoMart") collects, uses, stores, protects, and shares your information when you use our website FirgoMart.com and mobile applications.

privacyPolicy.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacyPolicy.content: We may collect Personal Information (name, phone, email, addresses), Payment & Financial Information (transaction IDs, masked details handled by gateways), and Technical Information (IP, device, browser, cookies, location if permitted).

privacyPolicy.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
privacyPolicy.content: Processing orders and deliveries; customer support; fraud detection; improving performance; sending offers and notifications (opt-out available); and legal compliance. We never sell your personal data.

privacyPolicy.title: 4. Sharing of Information
privacyPolicy.content: Shared only with verified delivery partners, payment gateways, IT service providers, or government authorities when legally required. No unauthorized third-party sharing.

privacyPolicy.title: 5. Data Storage & Security
privacyPolicy.content: We follow ISO/IEC 27001-aligned practices. Data is stored securely on servers located in India, compliant with applicable laws.

privacyPolicy.title: 6. User Rights
privacyPolicy.content: You may request access, correction, deletion of non-essential data, or unsubscribe from marketing communications by contacting support.

privacyPolicy.title: 7. Contact
privacyPolicy.content: Support: support@firgomart.com | Help: help@firgomart.com | Address: 48/2B, Radhanath Chowdhury Road, Kolkata – 700015, West Bengal, India.

termsOfService.title: 1. Introduction
termsOfService.content: These Terms govern your access to and use of FirgoMart.com, owned and operated by FirgoMart 24Logistics Private Limited. By using our website or mobile application, you agree to these Terms.

termsOfService.title: 2. Eligibility
termsOfService.content: You must be 18+ years old, have a valid mobile number and email, and use the platform only for lawful purchases.

termsOfService.title: 3. Account Registration
termsOfService.content: Provide accurate information, maintain confidentiality of login credentials, and take responsibility for all activities under your account.

termsOfService.title: 4. Products & Services
termsOfService.content: Products are subject to availability, are described as accurately as possible, and are provided by verified sellers or FirgoMart. Listings may be updated or discontinued at any time.

termsOfService.title: 5. Pricing & Payment
termsOfService.content: Prices may include or exclude applicable taxes. Accepted methods include UPI, Credit/Debit Cards, Net Banking, Wallets, and other approved gateways. FirgoMart may cancel suspicious transactions.

termsOfService.title: 6. Shipping, Returns & Refunds
termsOfService.content: Delivery timelines are estimates and may vary. Returns and refunds are governed by the Refund & Return Policy, which varies by category.

termsOfService.title: 7. Governing Law
termsOfService.content: These Terms are governed by Indian law. Disputes fall under the jurisdiction of courts in Kolkata, West Bengal.

cookiesPolicy.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
cookiesPolicy.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help websites function, improve user experience, and analyze usage.

cookiesPolicy.title: 2. Types We Use
cookiesPolicy.content: Essential cookies (required for the site), Performance cookies (analytics), Functional cookies (preferences), and Marketing cookies (offers and recommendations).

cookiesPolicy.title: 3. Managing Cookies
cookiesPolicy.content: You can control cookies via your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

disclaimer.title: 1. General
disclaimer.content: Information on FirgoMart is provided in good faith for general purposes. We make no warranties about completeness or accuracy; use at your own discretion.

disclaimer.title: 2. External Links
disclaimer.content: We may link to external websites. We are not responsible for their content or practices.

sitemap.title: 1. Overview
sitemap.content: This sitemap provides a structured overview of major sections including Home, Categories, Help Center, Policies, and Seller Resources.

affiliateProgram.title: 1. Participation
affiliateProgram.content: Join FirgoMart’s Affiliate Program to earn commissions by referring customers. Participation is subject to approval and compliance with program guidelines.

affiliateProgram.title: 2. Commission & Payouts
affiliateProgram.content: Commissions are calculated on eligible purchases and paid out as per the schedule. Fraudulent or self-referrals are prohibited.
